A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Poor fan service. I went into this film with lots of build up - and Rian Johnson just undercut it all. 

Major characters just thrown away as though disposable\, completely leaving the viewer dissatisfied with the build up they'd been given. Previous character development from previous films just binned as people act in bizarrely uncharacteristic fashion. Random and cheap acts of nostalgia turning up to explain plot points. The least funny star wars\, crammed with forced jokes that don't land. 

Seriously worried that this has such high reviews just because it has entertaining fight scenes.
